article-1.author: John Doe
article-1.title: How a Paypal Account was Hacked Using Social Engeneering
article-1.description: Brian Krebs discovered that on Christmas Eve his PayPal account was hacked, not due to a compromised password, but because the attacker called customer support to reset the password.
